body_html:
Sorry @apaszke , I miswrote my example slightly. Here's an actual Numpy example of the behavior I would like

> a = numpy.array([[1,3],[1,4],[2,2]])
> idx = a[:,0] == 1
> a[idx]
array([[1, 3],
       [1, 4]])
# similarly
> idx = a[0] == 1
> a[:,idx]
array([[1],
       [1],
       [2]])
body_text:
Sorry @apaszke , I miswrote my example slightly. Here's an actual Numpy example of the behavior I would like
> a = numpy.array([[1,3],[1,4],[2,2]])
> idx = a[:,0] == 1
> a[idx]
array([[1, 3],
       [1, 4]])
# similarly
> idx = a[0] == 1
> a[:,idx]
array([[1],
       [1],
       [2]])
body:
Sorry @apaszke , I miswrote my example slightly. Here's an actual Numpy example of the behavior I would like

```
> a = numpy.array([[1,3],[1,4],[2,2]])
> idx = a[:,0] == 1
> a[idx]
array([[1, 3],
       [1, 4]])
# similarly
> idx = a[0] == 1
> a[:,idx]
array([[1],
       [1],
       [2]])
```
